entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
